name: JustClickOne
description:
Just Pick Click One

A game in which the primary objective is to just click the number 1.

Controls:

  • Left Click: click on things
  • ESC: quits the game
  • Play Game: have fun

Resources:

  • Camouflage Texture from PngWing
  • Intense Explosion SFX from Pixabay
  • Next Level SFX from Pixabay
